title: Vercel Build Error
description: How to troubleshoot and fix build errors when deploying your Next.js project to Vercel.

content.text: This guide will help you troubleshoot and resolve build errors when deploying your Next.js project to Vercel.

items: Using Node.js modules like 'fs' or 'path' at runtime
Build script errors or missing dependencies
Replace all runtime 'fs' and 'path' usage with static imports or build-time scripts.
Check your environment variables in the Vercel dashboard.
Ensure all dependencies are listed in package.json.
Review your next.config.js for any server-only code.
Use build-time scripts to generate any dynamic code needed for your app.
Keep your JSON and static assets in the project root or public folder.
Test your build locally with 'next build' before deploying.

content.text: If you need further assistance, check the Vercel documentation or open an issue on your project's GitHub repository.
